definitions.title: vb. rebel
definitions.body: (NH id,; Ar. marada be bold and audacious in acts of rebellion or disobedience; Eth. marada: run strenuously, attack; marid: rebellion, Prä:Beiträge iii. 44; Sab. [[מרד]] rebellion Ha1:535:16 Sab. Denkm.:38 Hom:Chrestom. 127; Aram. mrad, [[מְרַד]]; rebel);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[מָרָָד]] 2Ch 36:13, 2 ms [[מָרַדְתָּ]] 2Ki 18:20 = Is 36:5, etc.; Impf. [[וַיִּמְרׂד]] 2Ki 18:7 + 3 t., [[וַיִּמְרָד־]] 2Ki 24:1, Ez Eze 17:15, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[לִמְרׂד]] Jos 22:29, [[לִמְרוֹד]] Ne 6:6; Pt. pl. [[מׂרְדִים]] Ne 2:19, Ez Eze 20:38, ´[[מוֹ]] Ez Eze 2:3; cstr. [[מׂרדי]] Job 24:13; —rebel, revolt:

against human king, c. [[בְּ]] pers. 2Ki 18:7, 2Ki 18:20 = Is 36:5, 2Ki 24:1, 2Ki 24:20 = Je 52:3, cf. Ez Eze 17:15, 2Ch 36:13, Ne 9:26; less oft. (late) c. [[עַל]] pers. 2Ch 13:6, Ne 2:19; abs. Ge 14:4, Ne 6:6.
against God, c. [[בְּ]] Nu 14:9 (JE), Jos 22:16, Jos 22:18, Jos 22:19, Jos 22:29 (all P), Ez Eze 2:3 (Co [[מָרוּ]]), Da 9:9; abs. Ez Eze 2:3 (pt., Co [[מורים]]), Eze 20:38, Da 9:5.
poet., against light only [[מׂרְדֵי אוֹר]] Job 24:13.
